p: The SHEO obtained by hydrodistillation using plants collected from the Czech Republic (with a composition dominated by carvacrol and γ-terpinene) was studied for larvicidal activity against Culex quinquefasciatus Say (Diptera: Culicidae). From the study, covering twenty-two aromatic plant species, resulted that the SHEO had a good larvicidal activity (LC 50 – lethal concentration 50-of 36.1 µg/mL), with a total mortality of 75% and an 100% deterrence of female oviposition for a concentration of 0.02% EO [ 52].
